DOC.brief_summary: The main objective trial evaluate prevalence alpha-1 antitrypsin quantitative functional deficiency adult French population present pulmonary emphysema . Phenotypic genotypic study carry whenever quantitative and/or functional deficiency display .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Alpha-1 Antitrypsin Dysfunction Pulmonary Emphysema
DOC.criteria: Pulmonary emphysema highlight computed tomography Ratio Forced Expiratory Volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) / Vital Capacity ( VC ) < 70 % measure lung function test Hepatic transplant Patient legal protection Patient benefit French Health Insurance
